attributes.additional_details: For two years in a row, exams have been cancelled. Returning to modular exams will result in fairer grades being awarded to A-Level students.
attributes.background: With uncertainty around whether or not A-Levels will take place and time in school being missed, make A-Level exams modular so that a fairer grade can be awarded to students.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569
